description: This hike on Pinecone Burke Provincial Park is a challenging but rewarding hike. Trail follows an old ski lodge access road (Harper Road) and then goes toward the Burke Mountain ridge trail. Trail highlights are the old ski lodge viewpoints, several ponds, Twin Lakes, Ted Kay, Hourglass and Lily Pad Lakes and mature forest.
directions: Access trail from Harper Road at gate near gun club.
title: Five Lakes Loop - Option A
